name: Custom In-Game Progress Bar Color
description: Change your in-game progress bar color!

practice-override.name: Override Practice
practice-override.description: Displays the new best color instead when you get a new best in practice mode.

normal-mode-title.name: Normal Mode
normal-mode-title.description: These settings affect the progress bar color in normal mode.

normal-working-mode.name: Color
normal-working-mode.description: You can configure the chroma, pastel and custom colors below. Support for gradient mode will be added in the future.

normal-rgb-speed.name: Update Speed
normal-rgb-speed.description: How fast the color updates. The higher the value the faster the speed.

practice-mode-title.name: Practice Mode
practice-mode-title.description: These settings affect the progress bar color in practice mode.

practice-mode-toggle.name: Enabled
practice-mode-toggle.description: Turn off to inherit colors from normal mode.

practice-working-mode.name: Color
practice-working-mode.description: You can configure the chroma, pastel and custom colors below. Support for gradient mode will be added in the future.

practice-rgb-speed.name: Update Speed
practice-rgb-speed.description: How fast the color updates. The higher the value the faster the speed.

new-best-title.name: On New Best
new-best-title.description:
These settings affect the progress bar color when you get a new best.

I recommend you also use the Golden Best mod!

new-best-toggle.name: Enabled
new-best-toggle.description: Turn off to inherit colors from normal/practice mode.

enby-working-mode.name: Color
enby-working-mode.description: You can configure the chroma, pastel and custom colors below. Support for gradient mode will be added in the future.

enby-rgb-speed.name: Update Speed
enby-rgb-speed.description: How fast the color updates. The higher the value the faster the speed.

issues.info: Please report any problems or suggestions you have to this mod's GitHub repository by making an issue!
